recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1 cup milk, 1 large egg, 2 tbsp melted butter, 1/4 tsp salt
Instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In another bowl, mix milk, egg, and melted butter.
recipes.instructions: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and stir until just combined. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat, and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake. Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden brown.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1 cup milk, 1 large egg, 2 tbsp melted butter, 1/4 tsp salt
recipes.instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package directions. In a pan, heat the marinara sauce over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Once the pasta is cooked, drain it, and add it to the sauce. Toss to coat, season with salt and pepper, and serve with grated Parmesan if desired.

recipes.title: Mixed Fruit Smoothie
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup strawberries, 1/2 banana, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1/4 cup yogurt, ice cubes
recipes.instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a glass, and enjoy chilled.

recipes.title: Veggie Omelette
recipes.ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/4 cup chopped bell peppers, 1/4 cup chopped onions, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tbsp oil or butter
recipes.instructions: Whisk the eggs in a bowl, and season with salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a pan, and saut√© the onions and bell peppers until soft. Pour the eggs over the vegetables, and cook until set. Fold the omelette in half, and serve warm

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan, Pancetta, Garlic, Salt, Pepper
recipes.instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and parmesan. Combine all ingredients and serve.
